name: POV Reverse Cowgirl
description:
This is a simple micro-LoRA for POV Reverse Cowgirl.

  • I suggest using this LoRA at 0.9-1.0 weight for best results if you aren't using a character LoRA.

  • I suggest using this LoRA at 0.6-0.7 weight for best results to use with character LoRAs.

  • Use CLIP SKIP 2.

  • I'll probably drop a V2 in the future to fix this issue.

  • Always add this to the prompt with the LoRA to properly activate it: 1boy, penis, vaginal, pov crotch, from behind

  • After that you can add other descriptive tags (sex from behind, vaginal, anus, ass grab, sex, sex from behind, pov, reverse cowgirl position, squatting, straddling, girl on top, etc.)

  • 1boy, pov crotch, sex from behind, anus, straddling will give you a slightly deeper penetration and It works a little better.

  • Just play around with the tags and you'll get different effects.

This was trained on NAI model. I have no idea if it works with realistic models. It works perfectly on some models and some others don't.

This LoRA was tested/and previews were generated on these models with OrangeMix VAE.

This was tested on AOM2 (Worked) - AOM3 (Worked)- 7th Anime (Worked) - Anything V3 (Kinda Works) - Dreamshaper (Didn't work).

Embeds and LoRAs used - Bad Prompt - Sonia

Everything I'm making will always be free but if you want to show a little bit more support, you can buy me a coffee - https://ko-fi.com/ekune
